stepBody: Find the $$x-intercept(s)$$ of the given parabola. Please enter your answer as "(x,y)" where $$x$$ is the x-coordinate of the intercept and $$y$$ is the y-coordinate of the intercept. Please convert $$x$$ and $$y$$ value into decimal form. If there are more than one x-intercept, you can enter it as "(x1,y1),(x2,y2)" where x1 is small than x2. If there is no x-intercept for this function, please enter "N".
